Hello all,
      During the course of crawling, ExtractorHTML will construc=
t
outlinks using any form action urls that it encounters.  Looking
through =
the source code, I think these urls are then fetched by an
HTTP GET transac=
tion (please correct me if I am wrong).  
      I see the setPost() method =
on CrawlURI, so I was wondering
what's the correct, recommended way to spec=
ify that a particular
outlink be fetched by an HTTP POST transaction?  Also=
, what's the
recommended way to construct a link string which is to be fetc=
hed by a
POST (e.g., www.domain.com/path?param1=3Darg1&param2=3Darg2)?
